quiz.question: Which currency is used in Malaysia?

Which country’s currency includes a plurality of languages on its banknotes reflecting multiple official languages?
Which currency is used in Indonesia?
Which Asian currency switched from the 'old' to a new series featuring modern security in 2006 with polymer notes later?
Which European country retained its currency unit named 'dinar' across multiple political regimes in the Balkans?
What currency do Egypt and several North African countries use historically under the same name?
Which currency is subdivided into 100 lere and used in Albania?
Which currency is subdivided into 100 centimes and was used in a North African country under French administration?
options: Algerian Dinar pre-independence French Franc linkage
quiz.answer: Algerian Dinar pre-independence French Franc linkage
